"Hmm," Sam wondered aloud as she and Carly walked down the hallway, "we can go to the park, but on one condition." She stopped Carly and whispered in her ear, "You have to mess your diaper once we get there." Then she grinned and added, "On my lap."
         Carly grinned back at Sam, "Well it would be nice to go to the park... I don't think there would be too many people there around now." Carly said as the two resumed walking. "And I do need to go..." she paused, "can we get the food and bring it there? Or do I have to have a messy diaper when we go to the sandwich place?" she asked.
         "I would be okay with eating in the park. Besides, you might end up being the one getting the food depending on how bad my diaper smells when we get there." Sam laughed as the two walked out the complex door. Sam took a look around outside: the sun was starting to get low in the sky, but there were still several people bustling about on the sidewalk. "But if you need to go before then, then by all means don't let me stop you." she winked.
         "I can hold it til then," Carly whispered as she began blushing from all the people around, "and I don't think you smell so bad. I've always liked that smell." she grinned as the two continued down the street. "I never thought you cared anyways Sam?"
         "Yeah well," now it was Sam's turn to blush, "well this is new for me okay?" she said in a hushed voice. The two were moving unnoticed along the sidewalk as far as they could tell, everyone around them seemed to not take much notice of the pair as their own thoughts occupied them.
         "Relax," Carly said, grabbing Sam's hand, "I was just messing with you. Besides, we're not really standing out right now and we move past so fast that most people probably don't even think about what they might have smelled." The two stopped and waited for the light to change, Carly looked at Sam still holding her hand and leaned near Sam's ear, "At least our waddles aren't so dramatic anymore."
         Sam laughed, "Well maybe your's isn't, my package makes things a little more difficult." Sam joked, her face easing. "So did you still want to go to the park then?" she asked as the light changed for the girls to cross.
         "Yeah, it's still a nice evening and I'd like to spend it out. Are you sure you wanted it on your lap?" Carly asked as the girls crossed the street.
         "I'm sure there are more ways to do it, but let's just go with that one for now." Sam said, squeezing Carly's hand as the two weaved in and out of the groups walking by them. "So what are you gonna get?" Sam asked as her stomach gurgled.

         "I was gonna try a Chorvic Chicken this time." Sam replied as the two came to another intersection. Sam sighed and glanced around, "So how are you?"
         Carly laughed half-heartedly, "Umm, I'm alright. How about you?"
         "Hungry," was the prompt reply, "but other than that I'm having a fun time with my girl." Sam said, pulling Carly forward as the light changed. "Are you having fun?"
         Carly nodded, "I'll be glad to talk more privately at the park." she said. "Nothing bad, just where we can be more... open." she decided as the two approached the front of the sandwich shop. Carly pulled them both to the side near the front of the store and took a deep breath through her nose, "Okay, well I can smell your... package... a bit." Carly whispered as Sam blushed. "I can go in and get our food alone if you wanted to just wait out here in the open air. You can come inside next time if you want?" Carly half-joked, hoping to get Sam out in a dirty diaper again at some point.

         "Oh you know, the usual." Sam joked, "People staring and telling me how awesome I am and whatnot." she laughed as she grabbed her meal. "So off to the park now?"
         "Yep!" Carly said, excitement building inside her as the two turned for the park. The sun was beginning to get lower than the skyline as the two approached the park. Finding it mostly empty and with even more people leaving for the day, the girls headed over to an area dotted with trees and approached a bench underneath one of the trees. "How's here?" Carly asked pointing at the bench.

         "We'll eat first..." Sam said.

"All in time, Sam." Carly managed a giggle, prodding Sam's side. "'Sides, you were on a role." She smirked.
         "Fine, fine..." Sam waved her hand in front of her face, "missing out on a mud rump, and my story's not too exciting."
         "I'll be the judge of that," Carly rolled her eyes briefly, shifting in her seat as she listened to Sam again.
         "Well, it was fairly easy to get an excuse to go to the store... I made sure I had my backpack though, so... well, you know." Carly nodded, "That, coupled with the fact I was only buying baby diapers - the largest sized ones, but still baby diapers- I figured I'd be in and out no problem." Sam recalled the memory, her heart was racing as she darted in the store and headed towards the baby aisle. She took the long way around the store, avoiding a direct bee-line, along with trying to hide her anxiousness. Her attempts to make it look like a chore helped by picking up a few other things to go along with the diapers: milk, bread, usual sorts of things like that. The final step was at the baby aisle, which had almost no one. The scent of the lightly perfumed diapers made nearly tremble in giddiness. Her eyes danced up and down the aisle, examining each type of package as best she could, picking a few out to simply squeeze. The plastic crinkled loudly as she cradled them in her arm. "Of course, I... waited too long." Yup, a couple of girls not too much older than her came down the aisle, noting Sam briefly before resuming their chat. She nearly dropped the diapers in the middle of the aisle right then and there to bolt, but... they weren't laughing at her or... Nerve coming back to her, she placed one package back, taking the other one along with the other groceries, to buy them and head home.
         "Sounds like how mine was... well, the first ones I bought at least, not the first I wore..." Carly blushed a little, brushing her hair out of her face before clearing her throat. "But, continue..."
         Sam raised an eyebrow at her before her mind resumed the journey down memory lane again. Upon arriving home, she threw her backpack containing the diapers into her room, and had to resist the urge to examine them for the rest of the day. More attentive people might've asked what was wrong, but she received no such queries. Once everyone was asleep, Sam pulled the pack out of her bag and simply laid down with them. Hugging it, poking at it, smelling it. Doing pretty much everything with it that didn't make too much noise. The pack itself and her knowing what was inside kept her heart racing the whole time, until she finally tore the side open and pulled three diapers out. "And... the rest is history!" She rubbed her arm, looking away from Carly for a moment.
         Her partner smiled and squirmed around some more in Sam's lap, her cheeks growing a little pink as her stomach gurgled loudly, "I suppose it's my turn... huh?" She balled her fist up slightly and tried raising herself out of Sam's lap. The dirty blonde's heart was racing once more, as she leaned back as much as she could to let Carly have her time. "Hnnf..." Carly bit her bottom lip, and her diaper soon began to grow quite brown and muddy inside, as the thick mush forced its way out of her bum and into the diaper. It pressed against the padding, forcing it to expand outwards and contact Sam's leg. The bulge continued to grow as Carly pushed as hard as she could, finding it hard and incredibly embarrassing to be pooing herself in public, on her friend's lap.

133131.content:
It was a brand new day.
Carly Shay had just arrived at school again and thought, "Today is gonna be great!"
However Carly didn't know that today was gonna be anything but great, in fact Carly if she knew what fate had in store, would have skipped school or left school altogether. Because, today... well I won't spoil that for you dear reader. Just keep reading.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------
Carly had just arrived at school ready for the day.
(I'm assuming she knows about the new school principal)
Just then the PA system turned on. What Carly heard next was shocking for her.
"Carly Shay to the Principal's Office immediately, please. Carly Shay to the Principal's Office."
Carly was shocked to hear that she was being called to the Principal's Office.
Then she remembered that there was a new Principal, and he/or she just probably wanted to meet her.
She was an internet sensation, afterall. The new Principal probably just wanted to talk about the web show.
Carly showed up in the Principal's Office shortly after, the announcement.
"Oh, hello Mrs.Sunshine I'm here to see the Principal." Said Ms.Shay to the secretary.
"Go right on in, but leave your bag here, you might be awhile." Replied Mrs.Sunshine to Ms.Shay
"Wait...why, what is this announcement just all about? Why do you want me to leave my bag?" Asked a curious Ms.Shay
"You can go in with your bag if you wish, I just thought you might want to leave it out here. And as for why you were called, you will have to ask the Principal he called you down here." Replied Mrs.Sunshine
Carly then walked to the Principal's Office door and knocked waiting for a reply.
"Come in." Replied a stern male voice.
Carly then walked into the Principal's Office.
"Ah, Ms.Shay so nice to see you this morning. Thank you for coming so quickly, please have a seat." Said Mr.Sunshine
"Thank You, Mr.Sunshine. Say by any chance are you and the secretary together?" Said Ms.Shay
"Oh, no we're not together." Replied Mr.Sunshine
"So then, what's all this about? Why did you call me down here?" Said Ms.Shay, as she sat in one of the office seats.
"Well I called you here to discuss your uniform. You see well the school doesn't prohibit web shows, they do discourage them. They say that it makes the stars of the web show so popular that other, less popular kids get picked on that don't watch or enjoy the web show. So, they came out with a few rules for the stars of a popular web show, such as iCarly to follow. These rules only apply to the main star not the co-star(s) of the web show. So Sam and Freddie will not be following these rules, neither will they be allowed to. Alright Ms.Shay." Said Mr.Sunshine
Ok was all Carly was able to say, a little shocked to learn that the school board created rules for web show stars to follow.
"Alright so as of now these are the rules you must follow at all times even when off school property. We will need you to sign some forms after making sure that you agree to the new rules after, they've been explained to you. And you guardian and older brother Spencer will be called here to sign any thing that requires parent consent after being explained about the new rules. " Said Mr.Sunshine, before continuing.
"Ms.Shay these rules come directly from the school board, and as the head of the school you attend I am required to explain these new rules to you, as you are the main star of your web show iCarly. It says here the rules were made to humiliate and punish the main star of the web show so students who are picked on for not only for not watching or disliking your web show but, might get picked on for medical or academic reasons as well. So the rules were designed to support these individuals by having popular social and school figures "walk in their shoes" so to speak. I am sorry Ms.Shay but the board has made these rules final as of today and they will be enforced by the school and staff."

"Rule one; the main star of the web show must wear disposable diapers, preferably Pampers cruisers or some other childish brand. To clarify the student will not be allowed to wear pull-up diapers or other disposable garments such as; goodnites, pull-ups, underjams, or drynites. Also this student is not allowed to wear adult diapers, or diapers without babyish designs. The school nurse will be checking this student on either a regular or irregular basis to ensure the guidelines for this rule are followed, and they will be keeping a log. The school nurse will check at his or her convenience and discretion."

"Rule two; the student must wear and use the diapers 24/7. The student should report to the school nurse to be changed. This student may not allow allow other students or staff to change their diaper."

"More rules will be provided the following day, the previous rules are a start. The school board wishes to start off slow so to give the main star of the web show transitional time to adjust to the changes. More rules will be given as the school board discusses this on going issue. May the main star be humiliated, so its audience become more accepting to those they have made outsiders. We thank the student for their cooperation to address certain issues, and raise awarness for deemed unacceptable social behavior. They will receive a glowing report card and a letter of recommendation as well as other rewards for their cooperation should they comply with these new rules."

"Well Ms.Shay i will call the nurse and get your guardian Spencer to sign some of the paperwork and to explain to him the new rules that have been implemented thus far, while the nurse gets you in your new attire. Oh and the school board has supplied some supplies that arrived early this week. You and your guardian, and older brother Spencer will need to get more as soon as possible."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------

Thanks for reading and there will be a part two to this for choice 1.
Choice 2 I leave up to the reading audience and community.
I will also be transferring this to http://www.fanfiction.net/

The female characters of iCarly get diapered(as you might have guessed). Don't read if you don't like dirty diapers

rules:
1. no killing off characters
2. diapers are to be used (ok not really a rule a rule but... do it anyway)
3. please no growth or shrinkage unless it's regression, this is a diaper story
4. have fun with it don't be offended if I edit this, I will try to notify as to why
5. chapters that aren't at least a paragraph long will be deleted (exception being choice chapers)
